    • Leader [620pts]

      • Dankhold Troggboss [210pts]

        Selections: Alpha Trogg, Boulder Club, General, Glowy Howzit, Troggboss - 1 DANKHOLD TROGGBOSS

        Categories: DANKHOLD, TROGGOTH, DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, HERO, Leader, DANKHOLD TROGGBOSS, MONSTER, General, TROGGBOSS General

        Artefact: Glowy Howzit, Command Trait: Alpha Trogg, Unit: Dankhold Troggboss (Alpha Trogg), Unit Abilities: Crushing Grip, Greater Regeneration, Magical Resistance, Shepherd of Destruction, Squigly-beast Followers, Weapon: Boulder Club


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Glowy Howzit The bearer has a ward of 4+. At the end of each phase, if the bearer was allocated any wounds in that phase that were not negated, roll a dice. On a 1, the bearer eats the Glowy Howzit and it cannot be used again for the rest of the battle. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p68
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Alpha Trogg Add 2 to this general's Wounds characteristic. In addition, this general gains the MONSTER keyword. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p66
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Dankhold Troggboss (Alpha Trogg) 6"1474+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crushing Grip At the end of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy model within 1" of this unit and roll a dice. If the roll is greater than that model's Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Greater Regeneration At the start of the hero phase, you can heal up to D6 wounds allocated to this unit.
        Magical Resistance Each time this unit is affected by a spell or the abilities of an endless spell, you can roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or the effects of that endless spell's abilities on this unit.
        Shepherd of Destruction When this unit issues the All-out Attack command to a friendly GLOOMSPITE GITZ TROGGOTH unit in the combat phase, until the end of that phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by that unit.

        This effect is in addition to the normal effect of All-out Attack.
        Squigly-beast Followers At the start of the combat phase, roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. If the roll is equal to or greater than the number of models in that enemy unit, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Boulder Club Melee2"43+3+-2D6

If you do so, this unit can attempt to cast 1 additional spell in that your hero phase and that spell can be any spell from the Lore of the Moonclans.

        Hoarfrost 812"Hoarfrost is a spell that has a casting value of 8 and a range of 12". If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Pick 1 melee weapon profile on that unit’s warscroll and roll a D3. Change the To Hit, To Wound or Rend characteristic of that melee weapon to match the result until the start of your next hero phase. For example, if the result was 2, you could change either the To Hit characteristic to 2+, the To Wound characteristic to 2+ or the Rend characteristic to -2. While a characteristic has been changed by the effects of this spell, that characteristic cannot be further changed or modified.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

If it does so and the casting roll is a double, this unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after the effects of the spell have been resolved.

        Babbling Wand Once per turn, this unit can issue a command without a command point being spent.
        Da Moon Onna Stikk If this unit is included in a Gloomspite Gitz army, friendly GLOOMSPITE GITZ units are affected by the Light of the Bad Moon while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
        Loonking's Crown This unit has a ward of 4+. In addition, add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for this unit.
        The Loonking’s Entreaty Once per battle, before you roll a dice to determine if the Bad Moon moves at the start of a battle round, if this unit is on the battlefield, you can say that Skragrott will reveal his prediction. If you do so, do not roll a dice. Instead, you can choose if the Bad Moon moves to the next location of stays in its current location.
        Warmaster If this unit is included in a Gloomspite Gitz army, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army's general.

        Gong Basher 1 in every 20 models in this unit can be a Gong Basher. Add 1 to run rolls for this unit while it includes any Gong Bashers.
        Netters Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are within 1" of any friendly units that include any models armed with a Barbed Net.

      • Loonsmasha Fanatics [110pts]

        Selections: 5 Loonsmasha Fanatics [110pts], Ball and Chain

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, MOONCLAN, Other, GROT, FANATIC

        Unit: Loonsmasha Fanatics, Unit Abilities: Release the Fanatics!, Whirling Death, Weapon: Ball and Chain


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Loonsmasha Fanatics 2D6"1106+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Release the Fanatics! During deployment, instead of setting up this unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it set up hidden as a reserve unit. You can set up 1 unit hidden in this manner for each friendly MOONCLAN GROT unit consisting of 5 or more models that is on the battlefield and that does not have the SQUIG or FANATIC keyword.

        At the end of deployment, secretly pick 1 friendly unit that is on the battlefield for this unit to be hidden within and record this information on a piece of paper. The unit picked must be another friendly MOONCLAN GROT unit consisting of 5 or more models that does not have the SQUIG or FANATIC keyword. This unit cannot be hidden within a unit that already has another unit hidden within it.

        At the start of the charge phase, you can release this unit. If you do so, set up this unit wholly within 3" of the unit in which it is hidden and more than 3" from all enemy units. If this unit was release in your charge phase, it can attempt to charge in that phase.

        If the unit in which this unit is hidden is destroyed before this unit is release, before the last model int that unit is removed from play, set up this unit wholly within 6" of that model, then remove that model as normal.
        Whirling Death The strike-first effect applies to this unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ball and Chain Melee3"D64+3+-2D3

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Gloomspite Gitz

          Selections: Glogg's Megamob, Under the Light of the Bad Moon

          Categories: Prime Hunters

          Battle Trait: Frothing Zealots, Lunar Squigs, Monstrous Regeneration, Moonlit Hide, Spiderfang Venom, The Bad Moon's Orbit, Heroic Action: Beckon the Loonatic Horde, Wade and Smash, Monstrous Rampage: Ensnaring Webbing, Giant Boing!


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Frothing Zealots If a friendly MOONCLAN unit receives the Rally command while it is affected by the light of the Bad Moon, you can return 1 slain model to that unit for each 4+ instead of each 6. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Lunar Squigs While GLOOMSPITE GITZ SQUIG units are affected by the Light of the Bad Moon they can attempt a charge move even it they ran in the same turn. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Monstrous Regeneration Each time a friendly GLOGG'S MEGAMOB TROGGOTH unit fights, after all of its attacks have been resolved, the effect of its 'Regeneration' or 'Greater Regeneration' ability is triggered. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p71
        Moonlit Hide Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target GLOOMSPITE GITZ TROGGOTH units while they are affected by the light of the Bad Moon. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Spiderfang Venom While SPIDERFANG units are affected by the light of the Bad Moon, their 'Spider Venom' ability causes mortal wounds on an unmodified hit roll of 5+ instead of 6. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        The Bad Moon's Orbit If any of the armies in a battle are Gloomspite Gitz armies, in the first battle round, after players have received their starting command points but before the start of the first turn, the player commanding the Gloomspite Gitz army picks 1 large quarter of the battlefield (core rules 28.2.8) as the Bad Moon's starting location. If more than 1 player in the battle is commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then those players roll off and the winner picks which large quarter is the Bad Moon's starting location.

        During the battle, the Bad Moon will move and its location will change. The Bad Moon starts in a quarter of the battlefield. The time it moves, it moves to the center of the battlefield. Then it moves to the large quarter diagonally opposite the large quarter in which it started. Finally, it moves off the battlefield.

        At the start of the second and each subsequent battle round, before the priority roll, the player commanding the the Gloomspite Gitz army rolls a dice. If more than 1 player in the battle is commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then those players roll off and the winner rolls the dice. On a 1-3, the Bad Moon does not move and instead stays at its current location. On a 4+, it moves to the next location. When the Bad Moon moves off the battlefield, it has no further effect on the battle.

        The location of the Bad Moon determines which GLOOMSPITE GITZ units are affected by the Light of the Bad Moon. While the Bad Moon is located in a large quarter of the battlefield, all GLOOMSPITE GITZ units wholly within that same large quarter are affected. While it is located in the center of the battlefield, all GLOOMSPITE GITZ units on the battlefield are affected.        		 Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p64
        Heroic Action Description Ref
        Beckon the Loonatic Horde Only a MOONCLAN HERO affected by the Light of the Bad Moon can carry out this heroic action. This HERO can immediately issue the Rally command up to 3 times without any command points being spent. Each unit that receives the command must be a different friendly MOONCLAN unit. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Wade and Smash Only a DANKHOLD TROGGBOSS within 3" of any enemy units can carry out this heroic action. This DANKHOLD TROGGBOSS can make a 6" move but must finish the move within 3" of any enemy units. At the end of that move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this DANKHOLD TROGGBOSS. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Monstrous Rampage Description Ref
        Ensnaring Webbing Only an ARACHNAROK unit can carry out this monstrous rampage. Pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this ARACHNAROK unit that is not a MONSTER and roll a dice. If the score equal or exceeds that HERO's Wounds characteristic, that hero cannot fight in the following combat phase. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65
        Giant Boing! Only a MANGLER SQUIGS unit that has made a charge move this turn can carry out this monstrous rampage. This MANGLER SQUIGS unit can make a 3D6" move but it must finish that move within 3" of any enemy units. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p65

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Chasing the Moon

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Chasing the Moon


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Chasing the Moon When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if the model picked to be your general has not been slain and they have been affected by the Light of the Bad Moon in at least 3 battle rounds. Battletome: Gloomspite Gitz 2023 p88
